mapper.select: SELECT role_name FROM role r INNER JOIN role_user ru ON r.id=ru.role_id INNER JOIN user u ON ru.user_id=u.id WHERE u.name=#{username}

SELECT DISTINCT m.url FROM menu m INNER JOIN role_permission rp ON m.id = rp.permission_id INNER JOIN role_user ru ON rp.role_id = ru.role_id INNER JOIN `user` u ON u.id = ru.user_id WHERE u.name=#{name} and m.type!="0"
